trans-unit.source: Defines a type of text content in which measuring, hit testing and drawing of the entire content is done in whole.
trans-unit.target: 定义一种文本内容类型，其中的度量、命中测试以及整个内容的绘制都将作为整体执行。

trans-unit.source: An example of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEmbeddedObject> is a button in the middle of a line of text.
trans-unit.target: 一个示例<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEmbeddedObject>是文本行的中间的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEmbeddedObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEmbeddedObject" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the line breaking condition after the text object.
trans-unit.target: 获取文本对象之后的换行条件。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.LineBreakCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.LineBreakCondition" /> 的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the line breaking condition before the text object.
trans-unit.target: 获取文本对象之前的换行条件。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.LineBreakCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.LineBreakCondition" /> 的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that determines if the text object is drawn from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值确定是否从右向左绘制文本对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that determines if the text object is drawn with its side parallel to the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值确定是否沿文本对象的平行于基线的侧边绘制文本对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the computed bounding box of the text object.
trans-unit.target: 获取文本对象的已计算出的边界框。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> value that represents the bounding box size of the text object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 值，表示文本对象的边界框大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> to use for rendering the text object.
trans-unit.target: 要用于呈现文本对象的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> value that represents the origin where the text object is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 值，表示文本对象的起始绘制位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that determines if the text object is drawn from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值确定是否从右向左绘制文本对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that determines if the text object is drawn with its side parallel to the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值确定是否沿文本对象的平行于基线的侧边绘制文本对象。

trans-unit.source: Draws the text object.
trans-unit.target: 绘制文本对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the remaining paragraph width.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示剩余段落宽度的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: Get text object measurement metrics that will fit within the specified remaining width of the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 获取将适合所指定剩余段落宽度的文本对象度量规格。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEmbeddedObjectMetrics" /> value that represents the text object metrics.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示文本对象规格的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEmbeddedObjectMetrics" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the text object has a fixed size regardless of where it is placed within a line.
trans-unit.target: 确定文本对象是否具有固定大小，而无论它在行中的位置如何。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the text object has a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本对象具有固定大小，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
